lines.content: ### Project Cheems is a CLI todo application.
### Ensure that you have JRE on your device to run the .JAR file.
Deadline, Event, and Todo are the types of the Task while Not Done and Done are the status of the Task.
Adds a Deadline to your list. Format: `deadline <task-description> /<deadline>`. Example:
Adds an Event to your list. Format: `event <task-description> /<timing>`. Example:
Adds a ToDo to your list. Format: `todo <task-description>`. Example:
Lists all the tasks that you have. Format: `list`.
Hemre are the tamsks im youmr limst:
Deletes the Task on the specified index. Format: `delete <task-number>`. Example:
Marks the Task as done. Format: `mark <task-number>`. Example:
Ok! I hamve markemd the tamsk:
Marks the Task as not done. Format: `unmark <task-number>`. Example:
Oof! I hamve unmarkemd the tamsk:
Filters the task list to match with your keyword. Format: `find <key-word>`. Example:
Hemre are the matchimng tamsks in youmr limst:
Goomdbye. See you nemxt time frem!
* Keep asking user for input until it is bye.
* Creates a Parser object with attributes taskList and storage to update them.
* Parses the full user input and handles the cases accordingly.
private final TaskList taskList = new TaskList();
* Loads data from the txt file and puts the task in the taskList
* @return TaskList object with taskList containing the saved tasks
// Do nothing since it will write new file.
* Write the tasks to the txt file
* Prints all the tasks in the List.
System.out.println("Hemre are the tamsks im youmr limst:");
* Marks the task with the specified index as done.
* @param command Full text of user input.
System.out.println("Ok! I hamve markemd the tamsk:");
System.out.println("Error! You don't have that many tasks");
System.out.println("Error! Please enter a valid task number");
* Unmarks the task with the specified index as not done.
* @param command Full text of user input.
System.out.println("Oof! I hamve unmarkemd the tamsk: ");
System.out.println("Error! Please enter a valid task number");
* Add a new Deadline object to the list of Tasks.
* @param command Full text of user input.
System.out.println("Error! Please follow the format given");
* Add a new ToDo object to the list of Tasks.
* @param command Full text of user input.
* Add a new Event object to the list of Tasks.
* @param command Full text of user input.
System.out.println("Error! Please follow the format given");
* Delete the Task at the specified index from list of Tasks.
* @param command Full text of user input.
* Push a Task to the list of Tasks.
* @param task Deadline or Event or ToDo.
* Prints filtered list with Tasks that contains keyWord.
* @param fullText Full text of user input.
System.out.println("Hemre are the matchimng tamsks in youmr limst: ");
* Retrieves the full input text from user.
* @return the full input text from user.
String greet = "Hemlo from\n" + logo + "\nWhamt cam cheems do for you?";
String farewell = "Goomdbye. See you nemxt time frem!";
